- 
Aider concrètement au
développement local (création d’emplois à moyen terme)
- 
Soutenir l'autonomie, l'animation
et la pérennité d'une structure d'accueil à vocation sociale et culturelle
- 
Promouvoir et participer à un
chantier international, ouvrant à une formation aux techniques bio
constructives, avec l'application pratique sur le terrain : création de
nouveaux talents pour de jeunes volontaires
- 
Apporter à une cause sociale et
environnementale mon savoir et expérience en commerce et marketing, et me réaliser à
travers cette initiative
- 
Contribuer à l’émancipation de
jeunes brésiliens(nnes)                                                                                     Dans quoi va partir ma contribution?J'ai réuni mes économies pour moyenner mes ambitions, et pour me préparer à cetteincroyable aventure qui m'attend... cela représente un vrai challenge personnel.Je m’autofinance pour payer mon billet aller-retour, mon hébergement sur
place (totalité du séjour).                 
Cependant, j’ai encore besoin de récolter 3000 euros pour coordonner en amont la mise en place du chantier:-  Achat d'outillage et matériel nécessaire aux travaux de nettoyage et aménagement du jardin (1400 m2): 1 tondeuse, 1 débrousailleuse, 1 élagueuse sur perche, 1 taille haie, petit outillage (sécateurs,  cisailles, serpes, fauchards, plantoirs, serre, bacs à semis…).
- 
Participation au tronc commun, soutien et accompagnement de l'équipe locale.-  Repérage pour réaliser une vidéo documentaire, témoignage de notre action.Chaque apport est un grain de sable considérable pour la réalisation de notre structure eco-touristique. Si je n'atteins pas les 3000 euros que j'espère, la somme récoltée permettra évidemment d'avancer quand même sur le projet, à pas plus lent, lent mais sûr!Dans les faits, la réalisation complète du projet est estimée à 60 000 euros. Si la bonne volonté de tous nous accompagne, et que nous excédions les 3000 euros, cela financera l'achat de matériaux écologiques, afin d'assurer la rénovation de la structure et construction d’un kiosque, four et toilettes sèches en bambou et terre crue, adaptation des structures hydro-électriques, etc. L'impact de notre projet:Intérêt du chantier est multiple. Il peut se décliner en trois points essentiels: 
1. Soutenir la viabilisation d'une structure d’accueil autogérée, dans un lieu
protégé, destinée à la mise en œuvre et à la diffusion de programmes de
sensibilisation et de formation spécifiques (Education à l’environnement, Agro
écologie, Ecotourisme)
SUSTENTARTE,
ONG spécialiste en Eco construction et éducation environnementale et l'ICADC impliqué
depuis 1989 dans la promotion des jeunes et les échanges interculturels seront
les garants de ce programme.  
2. Promouvoir un chantier international, ouvrant à une formation aux techniques
bio constructives, avec l'application pratique sur le terrain, où tradition et
modernité seront mêlées pour rénover, améliorer et protéger l'existant de façon
coordonnée.
A
savoir: - Permettre l'évacuation rationnelle des eaux usées- Reprendre et adapter les installations hydro-électriques au normes de sécurité- Viabiliser un grand salon polyvalent doté d'une couverture végétale pour des activités abritées- Construire un Kiosque, un four et des toilettes sèches en bambou- Nettoyer et aménager le jardin pour l'implantation d'espaces dédiés à la production organiqueThèmes abordés :- Le bambou : techniques structurelles, construction des éléments- La terre : Usages et techniques de construction (adobe, torchis et pisé), modélisation- La couverture végétale : alternative urbaine durable, étanchéité et finitions- Les peintures naturelles : développement et application élargir la capacité d'accueil 3. À terme: Contribuer à soutenir l'essor de la population locale par l'apprentissage et la formation des jeunes et des femmes, dans le cadre de programmes intégrés de préservation de l'environnment et d'économie solidaire, d'après les principes du développement durable.Valeurs écologiques:Niché au cœur. de la Réserve écologique et archéologique de
Guaratiba, sur la côte Ouest de Rio, O Jardim de Gaya est situé face à la
mangrove, non loin des immenses plages de Recreio et Grumari, dans la
fameuse Mata Atlântica (Forêt Atlantique). 
L’environnement est composé d’un écosystème
riche de plus de 200 000 espèces animales et végétales. C’est un lieu
privilégié pour la découverte et l’étude de la faune et de la flore.   Le site représente des caractéristiques
naturelles qui favorisent l’étude de l’écosystème et le développement de
l’Ecotourisme. D'autres façons d'aiderJ'espère de nombreuses participations pour soutenir ce challenge basé sur des valeurs sociales, environnementales et (inter)culturelles. J'espère être encouragée à poursuivre  et à concrétiser mon projet personnel.Si vous ne pouvez pas donner, mais mon projet vous touche, par sa valeur sociale, culturelle ou environnementale, faites-le connaître autour de vous. Beaucoup d'entreprises ont une politique RSE largement orientée vers le developpement social et le respect de l'environnement, parlez-leur de ma démarche! Si vous vous déplacez près de Rio, n'hésitez pas à venir nous voir. Partagez un projet solidaire!Toutes les participations sont les bienvenues. Je vous
remercie d'avance de votre soutien qui m'encourage à poursuivre. Un compte
rendu vous sera adressé sur demande pour vous permettre d'accompagner
l'évolution de mon entreprise. Qu'est-ce que nous vous proposons en échange?Voici les contreparties qui seront proposées par l'association:10 €Carte postale de la région ou de nos actions, envoyée à domicile20 €Carte postale de la région ou de nos actions + Marque page personnalisé envoyés à votre domicile 50 €Contrepartie précédente + Tshirt imprimé avec un motif exclusif issu de nos travaux ou paréo Brésil100 €Contreparties précédentes + Compte rendu trimestriel +  2 entrées au Jardim de Gaya pour une animation musicale aux chandelles OU BIEN 2 Tshirts personnalisés 200 €Contreparties précédentes +  2 entrées au Jardim de Gaya pour une animation musicale aux chandelles + 1 Nuit pour deux au Jardim de Gaya OU BIEN 2 Tshirts personnalisés + Objet design fabriqué par nos artisans 300 €Contreparties précédentes + 1 Costume de Carnaval, OU BIEN 2 Tshirts personnalisés + Objet design fabriqué par nos artisans + 1 tableau de Guaratiba peint par nos artistes500 €Contreparties précédentes+ Apparition de votre nom ou de votre logo sur tous nos supports de communication1000 €10 Cartes postales de la région ou de nos actions + 10 Marques page personnalisés + 2 Tshirt imprimé avec un motif exclusif issu de nos travaux + 2 Paréos Brasil + Objet design fabriqué par nos artisans + 1 grand tableau de Guaratiba peint par nos artistes + 1 Nuits pour deux au Jardim de Gaya + 1 diner avec animation musicale aux chandelles + 2 Entrées au Carnaval en costume + Apparition de votre nom ou de votre logo sur tous nos supports de communication                                                     



Hello everyone!



I am 25 years old and I am supporting a French NGO currently working on deploying a beautiful project full of meaning and hope...  
Les Apprentis de l'Espérance, is a cultural NGO for social development. They are setting up an eco-friendly volunteering worksite taking place in Rio De Janeiro in association with SUSTENTARTE, NGO specialist in eco-friendly construction and environemental education, and ICADC (Instituto para Desenvolvimento e Comunicaçâo),an NGO involved since 1989 in intercultural and youth exchanges.


The concept:
O Jardim de Gaya aspires to become a host venue and a place focused on cultural and technical exchanges in the fields of environmental education and social tourism. 
The project is focused on converting O Jardim de Gaya, a fisherman's house, located in the middle of an ecological reserve,into an Eco-friendly touristic house (for about 20 people). In the medium term, the goal is giving autonomy to this place of living by offering accommodation, restauration and animation of social, cultural and environmental activities...
Renovating and livening up the site will be a source of local employment and emancipation (positions for managing the organisation and all the activities).







Utility of my mission:
-  Helping local development (positions opening in the mid-term)
-  Supporting the autonomy, the animation and the sustainability of a multipurpose center
-  Promoting and participating in an international work-site, offering an Eco-friendly construction techniques training,together with practice in location: creation of new talents for young volunteers.
-  Bringing my educational background and experience in business and marketing area to a social cause/matter
-  Contributing to the local emancipation of Brazilian's youth                                                                                                                              

Where is my contribution going?
I gathered my savings for reaching my ambition, and for getting ready to this amazing Eco-friendly adventure... That represents a real challenge. 
I am self-financing my round trip ticket and my accommodation expenses.

                                                         

However, I still need to collect 3000 euros to carry out in advance the organization and coordination of the work-site:
-  Purchased set of tools and equipment necessary to the cleaning up and layout of the garden (1400 m2): 
1 lawn-mower, 1 brush cutter, 1 pruner, 1 hedge trimmer, common small tools (pruning shears,  shears, billhooks, dibbles, greenhouses, etc.).
-  Participated shared expenses (food, water, electricity, Internet, etc.), supported local team on site.
-  Location scouting for making a documentary to record our action.

Each and every input is critical, it is a grain of sand for the multipurpose Eco-friendly center achievement. If I could not reach the expected 3000 euros, what will be collected will allow us to carry on this project anyway, slower but for sure!

The reality is that the complete budget for creating this project is evaluated to be around 60 000 euros. If the good will of you all follows us, and we over-achieve the amount of 3000 euros,it would pay for buying Eco-friendly tools in order to guarantee the renovation of the existing structure (fisherman's house) and the construction of a pavilion, oven and dry restrooms in bamboo and mud, hydroelectric adjustment, etc.







The concerns of this project are multiple:




* Supporting the promotion and animation of O Jardim deGaya as a lasting  and sustainable project.• Giving the opportunity to youth and families to participate actively in the social, cultural and economic development of their region, a hotel and tourism eco paid business                                                                                                                                
•Encouraging education, learning, training andresearch, and support the discovery andpreservation of biodiversity                                                  •Accommodating a public eager to discover and experience Brazilian cities differently and foster international cooperation•Strengthening the participation of local schools and communities•Settig up artisanal workshops to expand the solidarity trade (recycling, jewelry, crafts, cooking)•Enhaninge direct and indirect job creation, related to the services provided in support of the structure                                                   •Transfering knowledge and know-how through the exchange of information and ecological experience (SUSTENTARTE):> BAMBOO : structural techniques, construction of elements.> CLAY : uses and techniques of building up (adobe and cob), models.> VEGETAL COVERING : urban sustainable alternative, impermeability, completion.> NATURAL PAINTS : developing and applying.•Organizing excursions to discover the ecosystem,flora and fauna of the region
                                                         •In a longer term, establishing an economically viable business with theconstruction and equipment of a rural guest house, by 2014 (World Cup Football)
Other ways to help us out:
I am expecting loads of constributions to support this challenge based on social, environmental and (multi)cultural values. I hope you will all cheer me on to pursue and make this project real.If you cannot afford a donation, but the project makes sense to you and affect you, please let your family, friends, colleagues know about it. Many companies are Corporate Social Responsability (CSR) oriented, tell them about our project!If you go to Rio, you are more than welcome to stop by! Let's share a project of solidarity!There isn't a minimum donation, all contribution are important to us! I thank you in advance you support to pursue this adventure and challenge. A report will be sent over on request to allow you following our progression. What are we offering in return?€ 10 Postcard from the region or of our actions, sent home€ 20Postcard from the region or of our actions + Customized bookmark sent home € 50Previous rewards + Tshirt printed with an exclusive design from our work or "Pareo Brazil"€ 100Previous rewards + Quarterly updates + 2 entries for a candle-light musical entertainment in O Jardim de Gaya OR 2 Customized Tshirts€ 200Previous rewards + 2 entries for a candle-light musical entertainment in O Jardim de Gaya + 1 Night for two people at O Jardim de Gaya OR 2 Home made gifts (by local craftsmen)€ 300Previous rewards + 1 Carnival Costume, OR Tshirts + 2 Home made gifts (by local craftsmen) + 1 painting of Guaratiba by our artists€ 500Previous rewards + Your name or logo display in all our communication media€ 1,00010 Postcards from the region or of our actions + 10 bookmarks + 2 Tshirt printed with an exclusive design from our work + 2 "Pareo Brazil"+ 1 Homemade gift (by local craftsmen) + 1 large paiting of Guaratiba by our artists + 1 night for two people at O Jardim de Gaya + 1 candlelight dinner with musical entertainment + 2 Entries to the Carnival in costume + Your name or logo display in all our communication media

story:
Midnight Finals is an annual show celebrating the League of Legends World Championship Finale. Hosted in sunny Orange County, Midnight Finals will bring the excitement of a national-level live event to over a thousand gamers and attendees. Held in Orange County at the OC Fair and Events Center on October 18th 6 PM to October 19th 6 AM, there will be plenty of space to party!

The Midnight Finals is not just a viewing. It is a festival, a party, an unforgettable experience. With planned shows, hot food all night long, and lots of excited fans, this cannot be compared to any other viewing event previously held in Southern California. With over 20,000 square feet of viewing space and over 5,000 square feet for events, sponsor booths, and food, there is enough to enjoy for everyone.



So what is there to do at our event?

·  Participate in our carnival with mini-games and prizes to boot

·  Try your luck in raffles from your favorite game and hardware companies

·  Revel in giveaways held by the volunteer staff

·  Watch live shows by local artists, dance crews, and more

·  Partake in the Tech Expo showcasing some of the newest technology on the market

·  Explore vendor booths selling and showing off some of their coolest products


We have a lot planned this year which will blow all of our past events out of the water. Here's what we are expecting.

·  More than 1,500 attendees

·  Over 150 hardware and rare item giveaways and raffles

·  Over 2,000 small item giveaways and raffles

·  About 200 after party attendees

·  Around 30 cosplayers

·  More than 100 mini-games and activities

·  40 volunteers

·  Free Transportation for all nearby areas

·  Concert-quality video, sound, and production

·  Front page feature on the League of Legends sub-reddit

·  Listing on the Riot Games Viewing Party Map


Just to get an idea of what we are capable of, here are some stats from our event last year, which was one of the largest of its kind, garnering the attention of Riot Games and many local sponsors!

·  Approximately 850 attendees

·  More than 70 hardware and rare item giveaways and raffles

·  Over 1,000 small item giveaways and raffles

·  Around 80 after-party attendees

·  7 cosplayers

·  25 mini-games and activities

·  24 volunteers

·  Front page feature on the League of Legends sub-reddit

·  Listing on the Riot Games Viewing Party Map



We want to reward you guys for how much support we get. It wouldn't make sense if we weren't able to provide more than what we already expect. For every stretch goal we pass, we'll bring something new to the event! Below are some of the goals we have planned and will definitely be able to do for you guys.

·  2,000 Dollars: We'll be able to set up an Artist's Alley, so for people who are interested in selling their merch or art, let us know! We'll set you up with this great opportunity.

·  3,500 Dollars: We’ll be able to set up fairground games held by various organizations with awesome prizes, so if you want that coveted t-shirt or headset that someone won from a Raffle, you can earn it yourself at these booths! Anyone up for a game of Whack-A-Teemo?

·  5,000 Dollars: We’ll be able to pull in another half-dozen food spaces for you guys so there will be more variable food choices! Right now we're looking at Eastern and Hispanic foods.

·  6,500 Dollars: We’ll be able to bring more chairs to have a bigger viewing space! We should be able to expand our current arrangement of approximate 1,200 chairs to over 1,500.

·  8,000 Dollars: Wow, we didn't expect to get this much! With this amount of money, we’ll be able to rent out a special place for an after party in the morning! Ready for some early morning pancakes and League?

If we pass all of these milestones, we’ll put up some more to ensure none of the money goes to waste. Stay tuned!


Midnight Finals is poised to be one of the most engaging and exciting gaming parties of this year. Are you a company interested in getting having your brand name shown to over a thousand hyped fans? We can set it up for you. We have sponsorships that are available to everyone ranging from sponsor booths to customized live ads. However if you’re not a company and you’d love to participate still, we have other opportunities available. Our team can set up meet and greets with your fans, photo taking opportunities, and many other audience engaging event. If you’re a live band, a performance crew, etc. who is interested in performing at our pre-show half-time show or just even just coming out to our event, let us know. We can set up some special goodies and chances for you!

Are you a cosplayer? Do you have an awesome Ahri cosplay that you want to show off to everyone or an absolutely adorable Teemo cosplay that will blow everyone out of the water? We’re offering special goodie bags ONLY available to all cosplayers who come out to our event! Also, you’ll get a free “Skip-The-Line” pass (we know no one likes to stand around in a Viktor Set-Up in a line) as well as prime seating at the front of the show. We will also be providing a Cospitality area where we will be able to provide changing areas, free drinks, and a break away from all of the action with. Please let us know ahead of time if you are a Cosplayer coming to our event, so we can create that goodie bag and save a prime seat for you.

Contact us at contact@tagatuci.com if you want to get involved with our event!


The Association of Gamers

The Association of Gamers at University of California, Irvine is a gaming organization with nearly 300 members that introduces students to a variety of games, facilitates relationships between gamers, hosts social and competitive events, provides industry opportunities for our members, and spreads gaming culture among our peers. TAG at UCI has been recognized by top gaming companies, such as Riot Games and TeSPA of Blizzard Entertainment, as one of the flagship schools of the national collegiate scene.

Kathy Chiang

Kathy Chiang is a 4th year Computer Game Science major with a passion for games, programming, and watermelons. Although she dabbles in many game genres, she has a soft spot for MMORPGs. Currently she spends most of her time raiding in Final Fantasy XIV, hunting unsuspecting animals in Guild Wars 2, or looting treasure chests in Diablo III. When she isn't busy exploring various game worlds, she works with her friends and board members to create and execute events for TAG's community. Kathy was first introduced to TAG through League of Legends @ UCI when she became an active member upon the club's creation. She began to attend more events, offering her suggestions and time, which eventually landed her a position on the officer board. Through her experiences with the founding members of the club, she has developed a taste for involvement in the collegiate scene. For the Midnight Finals, Kathy will be serving as one of the co-directors!

Ernest Chao

As an avid video gamer for years, Ernest Chao has played a variety of games such as Call of Duty, Starcraft, and Rock Band. From the first moment he picked up Doom in the mid-90’s, he has been engrossed in video gaming. As one of the original founders of the League of Legends @ UCI, he strives to push the organization towards a brighter future and an updated vision. Using what he has learned in both Sociology and Anthropology, he plans to bring countless new and creative ideas that have been dreamt, but never performed in the Collegiate Gaming Scene to the organization. Ernest desires to fuel the flame of passion for all players and spectators of video gaming alike. As one of the Co-Directors at this event, Ernest Chao will be directing Midnight Finals towards a unique goal never before seen in the Southern California gaming scene.

SoCal eSports

SoCal eSports is THE grass roots eSports organization of Southern California. SCES is dedicated to building and developing community amongst all gamers and eSports fans in SoCal, across all game titles and genres, and has worked to revitalize the tournament and event scene here for the past 3 years. We strive to foster amateur eSports competition and grow amateur players by hosting tournament and LAN events, gather the community with viewing parties such as BarCrafts and PubStomps, unite local and collegiate gaming organizations, and strengthen and unify SoCal-based online gaming groups.

Thanks for all of your time everyone! We hope that you'll come out to support us so we can make this event the best it can be. If you have any questions at all, don't hesitate to contact us at contact@tagatuci.com!

ideas that have been dreamt, but never performed in the Collegiate Gaming Scene
to the organization. Ernest desires to fuel the flame of passion for all
players and spectators of video gaming alike. As one of the Co-Directors at this event, Ernest Chao will be directing Midnight Finals towards a unique goal never before seen
in the Southern California gaming scene.
SoCal eSports
SoCal eSports is THE grass roots eSports organization of Southern
California. SCES is dedicated to building and developing community amongst all
gamers and eSports fans in SoCal, across all game titles and genres, and has
worked to revitalize the tournament and event scene here for the past 3 years.
We strive to foster amateur eSports competition and grow amateur players by
hosting tournament and LAN events, gather the community with viewing parties
such as BarCrafts and PubStomps, unite local and collegiate gaming
organizations, and strengthen and unify SoCal-based online gaming groups.
Thanks for all of your time everyone! We hope that you'll come out to support us so we can make this event the best it can be. If you have any questions at all, don't hesitate to contact us at contact@tagatuci.com!

story:
Short Summary

Dr. King is a world-renowned phlebology expert and instruction, but recent illness required him to take a leave of absense from work for several months. It's been a long and difficult road for Dr. King and his family, but you can help!

  • The King Family Fund was created to assist Dr. King and his family cover medical expenses in addition to living and school expenses for the rest of the family.
  • Three years of hospital time adds up quickly even with health insurance. Dr. King's disability income can't pay for his medical expenses and his family's college expenses. 
  • Your donations pay for the medical testing and treatment Dr. King needs to get better and return to work!

What We Need

  • Our fundraising goal is $5,000. The money will be returned to the donors if the entire goal isn't met. 
  • Be sure to stop by the moving sale fundraiser at 18 Yorkshire Woods in Oak Brook on Sunday, August 10.
  • When our campaign raises funds, Indiegogo charges a 9.0% fee on the funds we raise. If we reach our goal, you get 5.0% back, for an overall fee of 4.0%

The Impact

A letter from Dr. King's daughter Annie:

Hi everyone! Thanks for taking time to check out my dad's fundraising page. For those of you who don't know, I'm Dr. King's second daughter. I love my dad so much and seeing him sick like this has been on the biggest challenges our family has ever faced. I'm studying marketing, and two of my sisters are in school as well. Tuition, textbooks, and lodging for three people is expensive! We're doing everything we can, but with my dad's medical expenses adding up every day I worry that I won't be able to finish college without incurring enormous student loans. So many of you have supported our family with prayer, visits, and encouragement. Thank you for everything you've done so far! Whatever you can donate to further help my family through this tough time is greatly appreciated. We can't do it on our own, but with the help of our friends and church community we can bring my dad back to health! 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Can't make a donation? Made a donation but want to do more?

    • Make sure to RSVP on Facebook for the King Family Fundraiser Moving Sale (on.fb.me/1qQA4qK)
    • Invite your friends to the moving sale or share this campaign using Indiegogo's share tools
    • Keep Dr. King and his family in your thoughts and prayers

story:
The Living Museum

Nine years ago, Hurricane Katrina ravaged New Orleans, claiming over 1,800 lives. Although much of New Orleans has been rebuilt, only one in five residents from the Lower Ninth Ward have been able to return.The Lower Ninth Ward Living Museum was opened in 2013 to remember and celebrate the neighborhood’s vibrant history and culture through oral history interviews and exhibits. The Living Museum has become a popular hub for community events and children’s programming. In the 1.5 years the Living Museum has been open, we have accomplished the following:

  • Gathered over 50 oral history interviews with Lower Ninth Ward residents and made them available online;

  • Held daily workshops and programming for local children, including homework club, drawing and painting workshops, holiday celebrations, movie nights and field trips;

  • Hosted community events, including neighborhood barbecues, book readings from Lower Ninth Ward authors, student symposiums, and rehearsals for local theater and slam poets; and

  • Welcomed over 2,500 visitors from 39 states and 12 countries.

Why We Need Your Help!

We have big dreams for this upcoming year. First, we would like to expand our children’s programming. The Living Museum has become a popular daily destination for about 30 children in the neighborhood, many of whom stop by daily for Homework Club: Money donated to this campaign will go directly toward:

  • Art supplies (painting supplies, markers, canvas)

  • School supplies (binders, paper, organizers, pens and pencils)

  • Books for a reading corner

  • Educational workshops (Study Tips, How to Make Homework Fun, Math Made Easy)

  • Field trips (zoo, Children’s Museum, poetry slams, holiday celebrations)


Our second dream this year is to  build an ADA accessible wheelchair ramp to ensure that the museum is fully accessible to everyone who visits. This is an expensive but high priority alteration to the facility.


The Living Museum is officially a non-profit 501c3 educational organization, which means that your donation is tax exempt!

The Perks!

For your donation of $5.00 or more, we will send you a limited edition Living Museum sticker!

And for those of you who donate $50.00 or more, we will send you your very own one-of-a-kind Lower Ninth Ward Living Museum T-shirt, so you can rep us in style!

story:
Dad's Burger Fast Food Franchise

I intend to launch a new business model, in the Fast Food segment, involving the automated production of hamburger snacks, operating in a fully independent way from the human aid, where the person, who wants to eat a healthy and natural food being quickly prepared, at the time of locating a Dad´s Burger machine, will get his/her snack in a few seconds, into a fully hygienic packaging and at a very affordable price.

The difference of this project, as compared with other ones in the same segment, in addition to the social call regarding the contribution to the Social Inclusion of destitute people, also refers to the proposal of offering, in the market, a natural and differentiated product.


We make available to the consumer two options of Hamburgers, being the Vegetarian Hamburger and the Hamburger of Meat and Legumes, similar to the traditional one, both produced by using organic ingredients.

What We Need and What You Get

We will launch a new business model; we will manufacture or buy Fast Food machines that produce hamburger snacks in an automated way, having capacity to produce more than 200 units per hour; they will operate in a fully independent way from the human aid, where the person who wants to eat a healthy and natural food, having fast preparation, at the time of locating one of these machines performs the selection of what he/she wants to eat, closes the order by paying with an electronic card and upon the confirmation of the payment, the Dad´s Burger machine prepares the snack in a few seconds, packages it and delivers it to the final consumer into a fully hygienic wrapping.

                                 

It is included in the solution the implementation of the sales of franchises of the machines, in order to speed up the amortization of the undertaking, aiming at the expansion of the business model.

According to the Euromonitor consulting firm, the fast food market reached sales amounting to BRL 55 billion in the year 2011, and it must grow as per the 56% rhythm up to 2016. Within this scenario, the main networks of food franchises in Brazil, at the present time, April 19, 2013, have 3,100 restaurants and they already have plans to grow almost twice up to 2016, with the inauguration of additional 2,500 units.

Source: http://www.nl.com.br/blog/uncategorized/mercado-de-fast-food-deve-crescer-56-ate-2016/



It is a market that has exponential growth rates, not just in Brazil, but in any location world-wide. Each passing day, the people are performing more activities and they need natural and healthy food, at an affordable price and prepared in a very short time.

When an investor buys a machine with franchise and installs it at a shopping center, the sole concern that he/she should have refers to the amortization period of his/her investment, according to two possible scenarios as follows:

  1. Supposing the installation scenario of 1 machine at the food area of the shopping center, reaching daily sales of 100 hamburger units per day, 14 months would be necessary to amortize the investment regarding the acquisition of a machine with franchise. In this scenario, the sales revenue, of the replenishment inputs for the installed machine, will allow to help 2 families of 4 persons (or, that is to say, a couple with two siblings) per month.

  2. Supposing the sales scenario of 500 units per day, the amortization would occur in 3 months, allowing to help up to 10 families per month with the sales of the inputs.

                                   

Premises


Cost of the machine / franchise

BRL 150,000.00

Unit cost: inputs + logistics + maintenance

BRL 4.00

Sales Price

BRL 10.00

Taxes (18% ICM + 4.65% Soc.Cntrb + 1.5% Inc.Tax)

24,15 %

Amount of the Taxes

BRL 2.42

Net Profit

BRL 3.58

Minimum capacity for lanches produced per hour

200

The Impact

What is the relationship of the Fast Food Project with the EAP Project? It is useless just having the willingness to help these persons, taking them out from the place where they live and moving them to another place, if they continue living in their present way, vegetating, being considered as worms of the society.

In order to really help, we need to awaken in them the sense of the life, to generate positive expectations and to recover the moral and family values. This goes beyond the theoretical philosophy, with respects, but it actually implies becoming involved, making that things happen.

Consequently, if we take out these persons from the streets, moving them to a place where they will really be able to be somebody, contributing, mutually collaborating, seeing their efforts and the fruits from them, they will help others, who are still in the situation that they lived in the past, informing them that, at the new times, there are expectations of a better life, we might not have the best professionals in the business field but, at least, those ones more committed and involved to make things happen and to achieve success.



Regarding the latest project that I coordinated, producing a generator of alternative and clean electric power, we started in January 2008, nobody believed, I sold many of the assets that I owned and by getting a partner, we finished the first prototype in 2009; I thought that at that time I could implement my dream, but I had a deception. I thought that the reason could be the fact that the system had limited autonomy, we continued the improvements, we got additional financial resources, very recently, at the end of 2013, the latest prototype, a 45 kva generator worked, without interruptions, along 24 hours, without the use of outside electric power, with self sustenance, I thought that I had reached the right time, there was no way not to have success, but I had another disappointment. If the technological secret is not disclosed, nobody wants to help, everybody wants to know just how the piece of equipment works, regardless the result that it will generate.

                           

                                                       EIP Generators

And time goes one and the persons, who live in the streets in situations of risks, continue dying; I do not like seeing a children begging money in the street, it is very difficult to endure it, consequently, thinking about these persons, I got the motivation and the inspiration to develop this solution and, with your help, I am sure that we will be able to jointly perform something very important and that our sons/daughters and grandsons/daughters will have the pride of informing that their parents and grandparents helped to make a better world for destitute persons.

Other ways to help

If you cannot contribute involving money, but you believe in our proposal, you can then collaborate divulging our project to your network of contacts. These persons count on your help, we also count on your support


We will prepare Fast Food by using organic ingredients

The Dad´s Burger Fast Food is a new proposal to supply healthy food, prepared by the utilization of organic ingredients and, at the same time, being an innovative way to fight the poverty.

Our vision is to generate a business model that allows the generation of enough income so as groups of unhelped persons and families can produce food having a differentiated quality and having an assured demand by consumers who know that we are contributing to the fight against the social inequality.

                             

It is a medium-term project, but it is fully possible to be implemented. In the short term, we will perform the training of the business partners for the certification of the processes regarding the production of the food ingredients and the preparation of the food, while this will occur, we will be getting new investors in order to start the acquisition or the manufacturing of an automated hamburger machine. We will also be preparing the place and the infrastructure to receive the unhelped persons by means of partnerships with the existing Street Dwellers Associations; we will perform the selection of the persons who want to get out from their present situation and, in this way, having persons already predisposed do collaborate, we will increase the success chances of the undertaking and, later on, these persons will be useful to be witnesses for other street dwellers so as they also adhere to the proposal.

Summing up...  We want to build a better world!

   DAD’S BURGER

Do You Want To Become a Part in this?

This is your chance to literally become a part of the new generation of fast food! 

The supporters of this campaign may get the respective face picture printed on the side of the fast food machine and have his/her name and photo in the Internet site of the collaborators who not only believed in the proposal, but worked to make it happen.

                    

Why we do need your money

Let us talk truth ... 

Hamburger machines do not work without food ingredients,

which are not produced just by themselves.

The people do not work for free,

Regarding any activity to be performed, money is needed!

Developing the Project of the Fast Food Machine for the automated production of hamburgers and the EAP (Education Alliance Project) for Social Inclusion is something that will really require high investments.

We initially forecast the need of US$ 10,000 to get started the structuring of the commercial partners, the preparation of the professional training environment, the hiring of the consulting firms for the certification as regards to the preparation of the food to be production, and the drafting of the business plan to attract investors.

In case that we reach the amount of US$ 100,000.-, we will be able to start the structuring and to buy or manufacture a machine for the automated production of hamburgers.

If we reach or surpass the US$ 400,000 goal, it will be possible to mount the pilot project that will allow us to define the franchise model and thus speed up the expansion of the undertaking.

Why we will be successful where others fail

In addition to the Social Call referred to the Social Inclusion of destitute people, the proposal is to offer a differentiated product in the market.

We make available to the consumers two options of Hamburgers, being the Vegetarian Hamburger and the one of meat and legumes, similar to the Traditional, both produced by using organic ingredients.

For the production of Organic Food, it is not allowed to use of substances that generate risks to the human health and the environment. Soluble synthetic fertilizers, agrotoxic and transgenic agents are not utilized.

In order to be considered as being organic, the product must be elaborated at an environment of organic production, where it is utilized, as the basis of the production process, the agroecological principles that take into account the responsible use of the soil, the water, the air and the other natural resources, respecting the social and cultural relationships.

The utilization of the “green manuring” will also be applied; it refers to working with the plants of the leguminous family and to gather green leaves from those plants, which favors the decomposition process.

The leguminous plants have the capacity to take out nitrogen from the atmosphere but, in order to complete the process, they get linked to the bacteria that are in the soil and it gives them an autonomy regarding the quality of the nutrients that the other plants have not and need.

It is planned to get the certification by entities that perform the analyses of the food production processes in order to verify and give guidelines, if it is necessary, regarding the procedures to be implemented aimed at eliminating the risks of contamination of the food as, standing out the quality of the products elaborated and the quality in the preparation of the food up to the delivery to the final consumers.

Implementation of the best practices as pointed out in the Process of Food Control Quality world-wide known as EUREPGAP:

  • The EUREPGAP Protocol is a Quality Control System that has the purpose of conciliating the rules and the procedures for the development of the Best Agricultural and Cattle-Breeding Practices;

  • EUREPGAP (Euro-Retailer Produce Working Group - EUREP) was organized, in 1997, as an initiative of the European retailer merchants and supermarkets, by the Protocol of Good Agricultural Practices – GAP for Fruits and Vegetables. Later on, the following Protocols were developed: Flowers and Ornaments, Aquiculture, Coffee and Integrated Assurance of Ranches/Farms (Cattle-Breeding and Extensive Tillages;

  • The main purpose of the EUREPGAP is to reduce the risks linked to the consumption of food, assuring the quality and the inocuity of this food in the primary production. The stages of the food processing are not reached by the EUREPGAP;

  • In addition to that, the EUREPGAP Protocol is based on a management system focused on the Continuing Improvement, which stimulates the rural producer to improve his/her management and production systems;

  • The principles of the EUREPGAP Program are based on the following concepts: Safety of the Food, Health, Safety and Well-Being at the Work, Protection to the Environment, Well-being of the Animals;

  • In order to demonstrate their commitment, the producers must be able:

    • to keep up the trust of the consumers as regards to the quality and the safety of the food;

    • to minimize the impacts to the Environment, preserving the nature and the wild life;

    • to reduce the use of agrotoxic agents;

    • to improve the efficiency in the use of the natural resources;

    • to assure the responsibility and the attitudes towards the safety and the health of the workers.

Regarding the Fast Food business model, it will be 100% automated, without the need of the intervention of an employee to collect, another one to prepare the food and another one to deliver the product to the final consumer, in addition to the smaller area required for the installation, generating a minimum reduction of costs in the range of BRL 50,000 per month (BRL 20,000 with the functional machine and BRL 30,000 with rent) or BRL 600,000 per year.

It will be necessary to hire just one professional to be responsible for performing the logistics process referred to the daily delivery and replenishment of the food ingredients/inputs in the machine, in order to meet the demand.


    ...:: ATTENTION – Lovers of the Fast Food ::...


We will launch a new business model, we will manufacture or buy Fast Food machines that will produce hamburger snacks in an automated way, having the capacity to prepare more than 200 units per hour, which will operate in a fully independent way without any human aid, where the person, who wants to eat healthy and natural food being quickly prepared, at the time of locating any of these machines, performs the selection of what he/she wants to each, closes his/her order with the payment by means of an electronic card and, and after getting the confirmation of the purchase, the Dad´s Burger machine prepares the snack in a few seconds, packages it and delivers it to the final consumer into a fully hygienic wrapping.

It composes the solution, the implementation of the sales of franchises of the machines in order to speed up the amortization of the undertaking and the expansion of the business model.

                                                               -x-x-x-x-x-.

The musical background of this presentation is the Tchaikovsky´s classic “Pas-de-deux” that means step of two persons, when the male dancer performs as the “support” to the female dancer, in order that she performs steps or positions that are only possible to be performed thanks to the sustentation by the partner.

We sent our call to you; this proposal will only be possible to be performed by having your collaboration.

Please help us to implement the Dad´s Burger Fast Food Project!

                                 

All of the colaborators will have their names on the collaborators´ link of the Internet site.

All photos are illustrative only.

Our vision is to generate a business model that allows the generation of enough income so as groups of unhelped persons and families can produce food having a differentiated quality and having an assured demand by consumers who know that we are contributing to the fight against the social inequality.


Perks

                                                       

[P1]- $ 5 - HD Wallpapers - Wallpapers of Dad’s Burger Fast Food for your smartphone or laptop

[P2] - $ 10 - Personal Thanks to You via E-mail - You will receive personal thanks, thru e-mail, from the Dad´s Burger Fast Food team –

[P3] - $ 20 - Personal Thanks to You via Mail - You will receive personal thanks by a postal card, delivered at your home, signed by the team of collaborators of Dad´s Burger Fast Food


[P4] - $ 30 - Dad’s Burger Fast Food Sticker Set – You will receive, at your home, a sticker for your book of annotations, telephone or laptop.


[P5] - $ 40 - Dad’s Burger Page Marker – You will receive, at your home, a fine page marker that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.

[P6] - $ 50 - Dad’s Burger Desk Clock – You will receive, at your home, a desk clock that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.

[P7] - $ 50 - Dad’s Burger Flex Squeeze – You will receive, at your home, a bending Squeeze that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.

[P8] - $ 50 - Dad´s Burger Holder for General Purposes – You will receive, at your home, a Desk Holder for General Purposes that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.


[P9] - $ 50 - Dad’s Burger Wallet – You will receive, at your home, a wallet made of special paper that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.


[P10] - $ 50 - Dad´s Burger Tree Key Keeper – You will receive, at your home, a key keeper.

[P11] - $ 50 - Dad´s Burger Car Keys Keeper – You will receive, at your home, a keeper for your car keys that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.


[P12] - $ 50 - Dad’s Burger Watch Holder – You will receive, at your home, a watch holder that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.

[P13]- $ 100 - Dad’s Burger Stainless Steel Can – You will receive, at your home, a stainless steel can that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.


[P14] - $ 100 - Dad’s Burger Squeeze – You will receive, at your home, a metallic and plastic Squeeze that shows the Dad´s Burger logomark.


[P15] - $ 150 - Dad´s Burger Pillow – You will receive, at your home, a comfortable pillow for the support of the neck, having the Dad´s Burger brand.


[P16] - $ 150 - Fast Food Dad’s Burger T-shirt – You will receive, at your home, a fine T-shirt, showing the logomark.

[P17] - $ 500 - Kit Stickers Set [P4] & T-shirt [P16] & Dad´s Burger Pillow [P15] – You will receive, at your home, a fine T-shirt, showing the logomark and a comfortable pillow for the support of the neck and a sticker for your book of annotations .

[P18] - $ 1,000 - Dirt Gift Set – This impressive set, to be given as a present, has a key keeper, and a thermic can and bottle; it is perfect to be offered as a gift to a special person.


[P19] - $ 3,000 - Kit of Stickers Set [P4] & T-shirt [P16] & Dirt Gift Set [P18] – You will receive, at your home, a fine T-shirt, showing the logomark, a sticker, a kit with a key keeper, a thermic can and bottle of Dad´s Burger.


[P20] - $ 5,000 – Dad’s Burger Big Kit – You will receive, at your home, a T-shirt [P16] (please choose the color), a sticker [P4] , a pillow [P15], a metallic Squeeze [P14] (please select the color), a Flex Squeeze [P7] (please choose the color), two key keeper [P10] AND [P11], a wallet [P9], a bearer for general purposes [P8], a Watch Holder [P12] and a page marker [P5], all of them showing the Dad´s Burger logomark.


[P21] - $ 10,000 – Dad’s Burger Ultra Big Kit – You will receive, at your home TWO kits [P20], with two T-shirt [P16] (please choose the color), two sticker [P4] , two pillow [P15], two metallic Squeeze [P14] (please select the color), two Flex Squeeze [P7] (please choose the color), two key keeper [P10] AND two [P11], two wallet [P9], two bearer for general purposes [P8], two Watch Holder [P12] and two page marker [P5], all of them showing the Dad´s Burger logomark.


[P22] - $ 50,000 – Dad’s Burger Special Kit – You will receive, at your home FIVE kits [P20], with five T-shirt [P16] (please choose the color), five sticker [P4] , five pillow [P15], five metallic Squeeze [P14] (please select the color), five Flex Squeeze [P7] (please choose the color), five key keeper [P10] AND five [P11], five wallet [P9], five bearer for general purposes [P8], five Watch Holder [P12] and five page marker [P5], all of them showing the Dad´s Burger logomark.


[P23] - $ 100,000 – Dad’s Burger VIP Kit – You will receive, at your home TEN kits [P20], with TEN T-shirt [P16] (please choose the color), TEN sticker [P4] , TEN pillow [P15], TEN metallic Squeeze [P14] (please select the color), TEN Flex Squeeze [P7] (please choose the color), TEN key keeper [P10] AND TEN [P11], TEN wallet [P9], TEN bearer for general purposes [P8], TEN Watch Holder [P12] and TEN page marker [P5], all of them showing the Dad´s Burger logomark.

upon the confirmation of the payment, the Dad´s Burger machine
prepares the snack in a few seconds, packages it and delivers it to
the final consumer into a fully hygienic wrapping.
                                  
It
is included in the solution the implementation of the sales of
franchises of the machines, in order to speed up the amortization of
the undertaking, aiming
at the expansion of the business model.

According to the Euromonitor
consulting firm, the fast food market reached
sales amounting to BRL 55 billion in the year 2011, and it must grow
as per the 56% rhythm up to 2016. Within this scenario, the main
networks of food franchises in Brazil, at the present time, April 19,
2013, have 3,100 restaurants and they already have plans to grow
almost twice up to 2016, with the inauguration of additional 2,500
units.

Source:
http://www.nl.com.br/blog/uncategorized/mercado-de-fast-food-deve-crescer-56-ate-2016/













It
			is a market that has exponential growth
			rates, not just in Brazil, but in any location world-wide. Each
			passing day, the people are performing more activities and they
			need natural and healthy food, at an affordable price and prepared
			in a very short time.



When an
investor buys a machine with franchise and installs it at a shopping
center, the sole concern that he/she should have refers to the
amortization period of his/her investment, according to two possible
scenarios as follows:



Supposing
	the installation scenario of 1 machine at the food area of the
	shopping center, reaching daily sales of 100 hamburger units per
	day, 14 months would be necessary to amortize the investment
	regarding the acquisition of a machine with franchise. In this
	scenario, the sales revenue, of the replenishment inputs for the
	installed machine, will allow to help 2 families of 4 persons (or,
	that is to say, a couple with two siblings) per month.



Supposing
	the sales scenario of 500 units per day, the amortization would
	occur in 3 months, allowing to help up to 10 families per month with
	the sales of the inputs.

                                   








Premises







Cost of the
			machine / franchise


 BRL        
			         150,000.00 





Unit cost: inputs + logistics +
			maintenance


 BRL        
			                     4.00 





Sales Price


 BRL        
			                   10.00 





Taxes (18%
			ICM + 4.65% Soc.Cntrb + 1.5% Inc.Tax)


24,15
			%




Amount of the Taxes


 BRL
			                             2.42 





Net Profit


 BRL
			                             3.58 





Minimum
			capacity for lanches produced per hour



200




The
Impact

What
is the relationship of the Fast Food Project with the EAP Project?
It is useless just having the willingness to help these persons,
taking them out from the place where they live and moving them to
another place, if they continue living in their present way,
vegetating, being considered as worms of the society.







In
			order to really help, we need to awaken in them the sense of the
			life, to generate
			positive expectations and to recover the moral and family values.
			This goes beyond the theoretical philosophy, with respects, but it
			actually implies becoming involved, making that things happen.
Consequently,
			if we take out these persons from the streets, moving them to a
			place where they will really be able to be somebody, contributing,
			mutually collaborating, seeing their efforts and the fruits from
			them, they will help others, who are still in the situation that
			they lived in the past, informing them that, at the new times,
			there are expectations of a better life, we might not have the
			best professionals in the business field but, at least, those ones
			more committed and involved to make things happen and to achieve
			success.










Regarding
the latest project that I coordinated, producing a generator of
alternative and clean electric power, we started in January 2008,
nobody believed, I sold many of the assets that I owned and by
getting a partner, we finished the first prototype in 2009; I thought
that at that time I could implement my dream, but I had a deception.
I
thought that the reason could be the fact that the system had limited
autonomy, we continued the improvements, we got additional financial
resources, very recently, at the end of 2013, the latest prototype, a
45 kva generator worked, without interruptions, along 24 hours,
without the use of outside electric power, with self sustenance, I
thought that I had reached the right time, there was no way not to
have success, but I had another disappointment. If the technological
secret is not disclosed, nobody wants to help, everybody wants to
know just how the piece of equipment works, regardless the result
that it will generate.
                                                                                  EIP Generators










And
			time goes one and the persons, who live in the streets
			in situations of risks, continue dying; I do not like seeing a
			children begging money in the street, it is very difficult to
			endure it, consequently, thinking about these persons, I got the
			motivation and the inspiration to develop this solution and, with
			your help, I am sure that we will be able to jointly perform
			something very important and that our sons/daughters and
			grandsons/daughters will have the pride of informing that their
			parents and grandparents helped to make a better world for
			destitute persons.


Other
ways to help

If
you cannot
contribute involving money, but you believe in our proposal, you can
then collaborate divulging our project to your network of contacts.
These persons count on your help, we also count on your support
We
will prepare Fast Food by using organic ingredients

The Dad´s Burger Fast Food is a new proposal
to supply healthy food, prepared by the utilization of organic
ingredients and, at the same time, being an innovative way to fight
the poverty.

Our
vision is to generate a business model that allows the generation of
enough income so as groups of unhelped
persons and families can produce food having a differentiated quality
and having an assured demand by consumers who know that we are
contributing to the fight against the social inequality. 

                             It
is a medium-term project, but it is fully possible to be implemented.
In
the short term, we will perform the training of the business partners
for the certification of the processes regarding the production of
the food ingredients and the preparation of the food, while this will
occur, we will be getting new investors in order to start the
acquisition or the manufacturing of an automated hamburger machine.
We will also be preparing the place and the infrastructure to receive
the unhelped persons by means of partnerships with the existing
Street Dwellers Associations; we will perform the selection of the
persons who want to get out from their present situation and, in this
way, having persons already predisposed do collaborate, we will
increase the success chances of the undertaking and, later on, these
persons will be useful to be witnesses for other street dwellers so
as they also adhere to the proposal.

Summing
up...  We
want to build a better world!
   DAD’S
BURGER

Do
You Want To Become a Part in this?

This
is your chance to
literally become a part of the new generation of fast food! 

The
supporters of this campaign may get the
respective face picture printed on the side of the fast food machine
and have his/her name and photo in the Internet site of the
collaborators who not only believed in the proposal, but worked to
make it happen.
                    Why we do need your
money
Let
us talk truth ... 

Hamburger
machines do not work without food
ingredients, 


which
are not produced just by themselves.

The
people do not work for free,

Regarding
any activity to be performed, money is needed!
Developing
the Project of the Fast Food Machine for the automated production of
hamburgers and the EAP (Education Alliance Project) for Social
Inclusion is something that will really require high investments.
We
initially forecast the need of US$ 10,000 to get started the
structuring of the commercial partners, the preparation of the
professional training environment, the hiring of the consulting firms
for the certification
as regards to the preparation of the food to be production, and the
drafting of the business plan to attract investors.
In
case that we reach the amount of US$ 100,000.-,
we will be able to start the structuring and to buy or manufacture a
machine for the automated production of hamburgers.
If
we reach or surpass the US$ 400,000
goal, it will be possible to mount the pilot project that will allow
us to define the franchise model and thus speed up the expansion of
the undertaking.

Why
we will be successful where others
fail
In
addition to the Social Call referred to the Social Inclusion of
destitute people, the
proposal is to offer a differentiated product in the market.







We make available to
			the consumers two options of Hamburgers, being the Vegetarian
			Hamburger and the one of meat and legumes, similar to the
			Traditional, both produced by using organic ingredients.







For
the production of Organic Food, it is not allowed to use of
substances that generate risks to the human
health and the environment. Soluble synthetic fertilizers, agrotoxic
and transgenic agents are not utilized.
In
order to be considered as being organic, the product must be
elaborated at an
environment of organic production, where it is utilized, as the basis
of the production process, the agroecological principles that take
into account the responsible use of the soil, the water, the air and
the other natural resources, respecting the social and cultural
relationships.












The utilization of the “green
			manuring” will also be applied; it refers to working with
			the plants of the leguminous family and to gather green leaves
			from those plants, which favors the decomposition process.


The
leguminous plants have the capacity to take out
nitrogen from the atmosphere but, in order to complete the process,
they get linked to the bacteria that are in the soil and it gives
them an autonomy regarding the quality of the nutrients that the
other plants have not and need.







It is planned to get
			the certification by entities that perform the analyses of the
			food production processes in order to verify and give guidelines,
			if it is necessary, regarding the procedures to be implemented
			aimed at eliminating the risks of contamination of the food as,
			standing out the quality of the products elaborated and the
			quality in the preparation of the food up to the delivery to the
			final consumers.







Implementation
of the best practices as pointed out in the Process of Food Control
Quality world-wide known as EUREPGAP:



The 
	EUREPGAP Protocol is a Quality Control System that has the purpose
	of conciliating the rules and the procedures for the development of
	the Best Agricultural and Cattle-Breeding Practices;



EUREPGAP (Euro-Retailer Produce
	Working Group - EUREP) was
	organized, in 1997, as an initiative of the European retailer
	merchants and supermarkets, by the Protocol of Good Agricultural
	Practices – GAP for Fruits and Vegetables. Later on, the
	following Protocols were developed: Flowers and Ornaments,
	Aquiculture, Coffee and Integrated Assurance of Ranches/Farms
	(Cattle-Breeding and Extensive Tillages;



The main purpose of the EUREPGAP
	is to reduce the risks linked to the consumption of food, assuring
	the quality and the inocuity of this food in the primary production.
	The stages of the food processing are not reached by the EUREPGAP;



In addition to that, the EUREPGAP
	Protocol is based on a
	management system focused on the Continuing Improvement, which
	stimulates the rural producer to improve his/her management and
	production systems;



The principles of the EUREPGAP
	Program are based on the following concepts: Safety of the Food,
	Health, Safety and Well-Being at the Work, Protection to the
	Environment, Well-being of the Animals;



In order to demonstrate their
	commitment, the producers must be able:



to keep
		up the trust of the consumers as regards to the quality and the
		safety of the food;



to minimize
		the impacts to the Environment, preserving the nature and the wild
		life;



to reduce the use of agrotoxic
		agents;



to improve the efficiency in the
		use of the natural resources;



to assure the responsibility and
		the attitudes towards the safety and the
		health of the workers. 




Regarding
the Fast Food business model, it will be 100% automated, without the
need of the intervention of an employee to collect, another one to
prepare the food and another one to deliver the product to the final
consumer, in addition to the smaller
area required for the installation, generating a minimum reduction of
costs in the range of BRL 50,000 per month (BRL 20,000 with the
functional machine and BRL 30,000 with rent) or BRL 600,000 per year.

It will be necessary to hire just one
professional to be responsible for performing the logistics process
referred to the daily delivery and replenishment of the food
ingredients/inputs in the machine, in order to meet the demand.    ...::
ATTENTION
– Lovers of the Fast Food ::...
We
will launch a new business model, we will manufacture or buy Fast
Food machines that will produce hamburger snacks in an automated way,
having the capacity to prepare more than 200 units per hour, which
will operate in a fully independent way without any human aid, where
the person, who wants to eat healthy and natural food being quickly
prepared, at the time of locating any of these machines, performs the
selection of what he/she wants to each, closes his/her order with the
payment by means of an electronic card and, and after getting the
confirmation of the purchase, the Dad´s Burger machine prepares
the snack in a few seconds, packages it and delivers it to the final
consumer into a fully hygienic wrapping.
It
composes the solution, the implementation of the sales of franchises
of the machines in order to speed up the amortization of the
undertaking and the expansion of the business model.                                                               -x-x-x-x-x-.
The
musical background of
this presentation is the Tchaikovsky´s classic “Pas-de-deux”
that means step of two persons, when the male dancer performs as the
“support” to the female dancer, in order that she
performs steps or positions that are only possible to be performed
thanks to the sustentation by the partner.
We
sent our call to you; this proposal will only be possible to be
performed by having your collaboration.
Please
help us to implement
the Dad´s Burger Fast Food Project!                                 All
of the colaborators will have their names
on the collaborators´ link of the Internet site.
All
photos are illustrative only.
Our vision is to
generate a business model that allows the generation of enough income
so as groups of unhelped persons and families can produce food having
a differentiated quality and having an assured demand by consumers
who know that we are contributing to the fight against the social
inequality.
Perks
                                                       
[P1]-
$ 5  - HD Wallpapers - Wallpapers of Dad’s Burger Fast Food for
your smartphone or laptop
[P2]
- $ 10 - Personal Thanks to You via E-mail - You will receive
personal thanks, thru e-mail, from the Dad´s Burger Fast Food
team – 

[P3]
- $ 20 - Personal Thanks to You via Mail - You will receive personal
thanks by a postal card, delivered at your home, signed by the team
of collaborators of Dad´s Burger Fast Food
[P4] - $ 30  - Dad’s
Burger Fast Food Sticker Set – You will receive, at your home,
a sticker for your book of annotations, telephone or laptop.
[P5]

You will receive, at your home, a fine page marker that shows the
Dad´s Burger logomark.

You will receive, at your home, a wallet made of special paper that

[P18] - $ 1,000 - Dirt
Gift Set –  This impressive set, to be given as a present, has

- $ 3,000 - Kit of Stickers Set [P4] &

[P20]

story:
JOIN US- GET GIVING GOING... TODAY!

Tragedy hits...who do you turn to? Chabad. A happy occasion, a lost relative, a sudden medical procedure, Proper Jewish burial, lack of funds for education and food, seeking guidance and direction, the will to learn and explore yourself and the world around you, warm kosher homestyle food, a safe warm educational environment for your child... Again, Chabad.

What and who is Chabad?

Chabad, under the leadership of the 7th Lubavitcher Rebbe, Rabbi Menachem M. Schneerson, sends Emissaries around the world to tend to the physical and spiritual needs of those in each country. Chabad adheres to the Orthodox practice of Judaism. The Chabad movement was founded in the late 18th century by Rabbi Shneur Zalman of Liadi, the first Rebbe of Chabad. The main philosophy of Chabad is GIVING and adding in GOODNESS AND KINDNESS and all services are funded solely by donations. 

In November of 2008, the first Chabad House in the Philippines was founded in Manila by Rabbi Yossi and Tiferes Levy. Although it is one of the last countries in the world to have a Chabad House, the Philippines now had three centers throughout the country since 2008. 

OUR GOALS

-We currently are working on building a NEW CENTER to house our growing programs, and be a LIGHT AND HOME AWAY FROM HOME in the Philippines. (The building will cost alot more than our goal amount.)

YOUR DONATION WILL BRING LIGHT AND HOPE AS WELL AS PROVIDE FOR THE PHYSICAL NEEDS OF THOSE LIVING IN AND VISITING THE PHILIPPINES... TODAY!

WHAT WE DO

-Daily prayer services

-Kosher meals

-Hospital visitations

-Visiting Jewish inmates

-Educational classes for adults in the Torah, Kabballa, and Morality

-Weekly programs for children

-Women Circle Events

-Holiday services and meals

-Jewish burial

-Classes for Non-Jews in the Seven Noahide Laws

-A home-away-from-home for tourists, businessmen and Kosher supervisors...INCLUDING YOU!

Please share our page if you are not able to assist financially at the moment. Thank you!

story:
"Now I know many of you felt like me this morning.  Dreading getting out of bed to come back here. Wondering where you'll find the strength... But, then you get those days, like I had yesterday.  One of the students had had an accident in his pants, so we went to help him get cleaned up and changed.  Like most accidents, everything was soaked through, down to his shoes, so we got him an entirely new outfit.  As he changed and washed up, we realized he did not have on any underpants or socks, and the front of his toes had been rubbed raw from wearing shoes that were two-sizes too small.  (pause.) (hard swallow.) ..Those are the moments.  (pause.) ..The moments that help me remember why we all come in and work another day.  For the kids.  For our kids." ~Teacher at Harrison Learning Center, Peoria, Illinois
Peoria, Illinois is a city which boasts a high quality of living with other cities comparable in size throughout the United States.  With that said, one must take into consideration that the community feeding into Peoria School District #150 is 74% impoverished, bringing a wide variety of challenges to the city and its community members.  Sadly, certain areas of Peoria are listed under the top ten poorest areas in the US.
Having come from one of the surrounding towns near Peoria, I never imagined the level of poverty which exists until I was hired as a 5th grade teacher at Harrison Learning Center, a K-8 school located in the poorest region of Peoria.  The struggles our children face every day would bring those with the coldest of hearts to tears.  Whether it be not receiving enough food to eat, unstable home lives, or coming to school with shoes two-sizes too small, our children face hardships most adults could not even fathom.   
Thankfully, Peoria District #150 is working hard to brighten the lives of some of these impoverished children by putting together a Christmas Dinner and celebration.  Our school is assembling Christmas bundles for six deserving families.  The bundles will include a Christmas dinner with all the fixings and a present for each member of the family.  Our goal is to raise $600 per family and present them with the food and gifts on the last day of school, December 19.  
With your help, we can warm the hearts of some of Peoria's struggling families. Regardless of what we raise, the money will go towards these six families to brighten their Christmas holiday.
I have been put in charge of raising money for one of the selected families.   No donation is too small.  I appreciate any help we can get.  Please tell your friends, and help us make this Christmas holiday a special one!
Merry Christmas to  all, and thank you for thinking of others during this blessed holiday season!

Erinn

story:
My name is Kashimir Napier, and I am a hardworking, thoughtful person. I come from a very challenging background, which taught me that I need to strive for the things I want.  I am currently striving to be successful in my up-coming business. My business is an all natural facial cleanse business. My product is called ''Honey You''.  It restores and rejuvenates skin  by using the beneficial properties of honey.

 Honey is the largest component in my facial cleanse.  It is good for your skin because it helps to exfoliate your skin and contains probiotics and enzymes. Another large component is lemon which opens up the pores. Honey and lemons together help remove dead skin and restore new skin cells. They both soften the skin, by moisturizing and refreshing the skin tone. They also help with blemishes and create an overall healthy, younger, fresher looking face. People need honey you to get rid of bad acne. The product is homemade, all natural  and people will like it because it softens and enhances your overall appearance.

 When people donate it helps me create and distribute more product. Through my business I would also like to donate to the homeless people. my business is very important because people will feel more comfortable about their skin. It puts smiles on people faces. 

Risks and Challenges

Mixing the wrong things together can cause people's face to breakout. Running this type of business can be very challenging for me because I have to come up with names, ingredients, labels and containers.  I am also working on a product that contains a natural preservative that will help my product have more shelf life.

You can like and follow me on facebook @Napier's Natural Cleansings And use the indiegogo share tools.

story:
Sadly the video that was here showing the US Navy and the areas we are trying to rebuild has been removed... 

The Bottom Line

Typhoon Haiyan (Yolanda) , the storm that devastated the Philippines, is at the top of the 12 most powerful storms on record.  Ormoc City (Philippiines) was hit badly when the Super Typhoon Haiyan came through, destroying the whole city and leaving thousands and thousands homeless and without food. Be a person of action and not just words.

  • We are a team of caring individuals and we are working hard for people in need..and We need your help too.
  • In past years we have given private family donations to various families in need to repair their homes from storms and provided funding for education for those who could not afford it on their own but had the drive to succeed.
  • My team and I have a great appreciation for the people of the Philippines. It is one of the worlds poorest countries yet they are a kind and resilient people, we have strong bonds to loved ones, friends and neighbors on the island of Leyte which was where Typhoon Haiyan made land fall and also destroyed the city of Tacloban.
  • Campaign founder- Humble 32 yr old man from the Florida Gulf Coast currently living in South Korea and traveling regularly to the Philippines over the past 4 yrs, I work in Telecommunications, I'm an active 13 yr veteran of the US Armed Forces and a philanthropist on a budget. 
  • You can help us achieve the critical repairs and ground up rebuilding of multiple homes for residents living around Ormoc City. This is an opportunity to provide safe homes that will be a cornerstone for rebuilding their lives, sheltering families from future typhoons and preventing further loss of life and tragedy.
  • It is a gift that will be seen as a positive reminder everyday of our humanity.

What We Need & What You Get

Details:

  • Our goal is to raise a minimum of $25,000 allowing for purchasing raw construction materials to accomplish at least 2-5 100% rebuilds and 5-10 home rebuilds requiring 50% or less reconstruction and many other repairs. 
  • Each and every dime and dollar will go directly to the Ipil community families on the southern edge of Ormoc City Leyte, many of who are now homeless. As this Campaign continues a family of 7 is finding shelter using a camping tent that I brought there in May.
  • We are upload records and updates continuously for these families and  be providing the same as we build along with photographic documentation (with permission) for each household that your donations touch. Already started!
  • I'm hoping to be on ground in Ormoc around 3 Jan 2014 to help with clean up, construction and talk with the families we are helping. This will take many months.
  • 5% of Campaign fees gets returned to the cause once the Funding Goal is met!

The Impact

Knowing the difference your contribution will make:

  • Home is where it starts and where we always are supposed to feel safe. Every father or mother strives to shelter those they love. The sooner people can safely shelter their loved ones the sooner they can focus on rebuilding their community.
  • Funding will be provided to families as needed to provide critical structural repairs  and basic materials (Concrete, Timber, Steel and Roofing) as a first priority.
  • All monies will continue to only be handled by trusted persons of the highest integrity to ensure there is no fraud or waste.
  • This project being realized is one of the most expedient and direct ways of delivering people to safe and sanitary conditions and providing protection from future storms. 
  • This project is about selflessness and trust.
  • Some funds have been already been privately received and committed to tools needed for construction and power generation. It will take months to restore commercial power to the surrounding residential communities and some people are walking 12-15km per day to charge a cell phone in the few places with power.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and help me with this campaign.
  • Here are other ways to make general contributions to the Typhoon Haiyan relief across the Philippines:
  • The World Food Program http://wfpusa.org/
  • The American Red Cross http://www.redcross.org/news/article/Typhoon-Haiyan-Disaster-Alert
  • Emergency Medical Aid http://www.americares.org/who-we-are/newsroom/news/monster-cylone-typhoon-haiyan-yolanda-strikes-philippines.html
  • Philippines Red Cross http://www.redcross.org.ph/
  • The Salvation Army http://salvationarmyusa.org/
  • Shelter Box http://shelterboxusa.org/index.php
  • Shelterfor https://twitter.com/ShelterforOrg Active on the ground in Ormoc and Samar Island now

And that’s all there is to it. May God Bless You for your consideration and any donations.

If your have any concerns or questions or ideas to help make this more successful feel free to email us (address on my profile).  We are on this everyday and committed to making it successful.
